title: Mobile Microlearning Design Strategies to Facilitate Training Transfer

context.prior_knowledge: Over five years of practical language education experience and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Training transfer optimization course for current language education practitioners: 15-minute modular learning using digital devices and real-time application tasks

learning_goals: Learners can identify three indicators for measuring training transfer across pre-training, mid-training, and post-training stages.
Learners can design two or more training transfer strategies tailored to their job environment.
Learners can complete microlearning modules with over 80% participation in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
